thread.title: Ellen Pompeo slams Daniel Craig over James Bond suicide remark
thread.title_full: Ellen Pompeo slams Daniel Craig over James Bond suicide remark

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: Ellen Pompeo slams Daniel Craig over James Bond suicide remark
text:
Comments 
Los Angeles, Oct 9: “Grey’s Anatomy” star Ellen Pompeo took to Twitter to respond to Daniel Craig’s recent comments insinuating that he would rather kill himself than return for another James Bond movie. (Read: Justin Bieber threatens to sue over nude photos in Bora Bora) 
The 45-year-old actress retweeted a link to Craig’s interview and wrote, “This dude needs a reality check”, reported Ace Showbiz. In an interview with TimeOut, Craig was asked whether he would reprise his role as James Bond after “Spectre”. The actor replied, “I’d rather break this glass and slash my wrists. No, not at the moment. Not at all. That’s fine. I’m over it at the moment. We’re done. All I want to do is move on.” When asked if he wanted to move on from “Bond” for good, Craig said, “I haven’t given it any thought. This dude needs a reality check https://t.co/adi4RYRXg3 
— Ellen Pompeo (@EllenPompeo) October 8, 2015 

For at least a year or two, I just don’t want to think about it. I don’t know what the next step is. I’ve no idea. Not because I’m trying to be cagey. Who knows? ”At the moment, we’ve done it. I’m not in discussion with anybody about anything. If I did another Bond movie, it would only be for the money.” 
  10:28 AM Topics:
